ISTR datasets

Source: R/data.R
istr_datasets.Rd

ISTR datasets

Usage

istr_companies

istr_inputs

Format

An object of class spec_tbl_df (inherits from tbl_df, tbl, data.frame) with 8 rows and 6 columns.

An object of class tbl_df (inherits from tbl, data.frame) with 74 rows and 10 columns.

Author

Lyanne Ho.

Examples

istr_companies
